hero.name: Hello, I'm Abhinay
hero.intro: Software Engineer specializing in scalable backend systems, AI-powered automation, and cloud-native platforms that serve billions of users.

about.description: I design and build intelligent, cloud-native, and AI-enhanced platforms that power high-impact systems. With expertise in Java, .NET, Azure, AWS, and AI/LLMs, I focus on creating scalable software that improves accuracy, security, and developer productivity at global scale.
about.education: Bachelor of Engineering (Computer Engineering), Army Institute of Technology, Pune

responsibilities: Built an AI-enhanced Windows Test Health Platform that evaluates test determinism, security, and modernization — indirectly supporting 6+ billion Windows OS users.
Migrated multiple cluster databases into a unified system with Azure Data Factory, improving system performance by ~50% and enabling AI-driven analytics on test health.
Developed an Automated Quarantine Service leveraging AI models to detect and isolate insecure tests, strengthening the security of the Windows testing ecosystem.
Transitioned from regex-based password detection to an AI-powered LLM solution, improving detection accuracy by 10x and significantly reducing false positives/negatives.
Engineered Java Spring Boot microservice optimizing GraphQL queries, improving API response time by 20%.
Integrated Auth0-based authentication, reducing potential security risks by 30%.
Automated CI/CD pipelines via GitHub Actions, cutting deployment time by 40%.
Worked with Grafana, Backstage, and AWS to enhance monitoring and scalability.
Led monolith-to-microservices refactor in Securities Confirmations domain, enabling future AI-based automation opportunities.
Automated trade affirmation workflows with Spring Boot, saving ~1.2 FTEs.
Developed intelligent document comparison APIs to validate trade data with configurable thresholds, improving settlement accuracy.
Streamlined data integration across microservices for faster downstream processing.
Automated trade workflows, reducing manual interventions and improving settlement reliability.
Developed APIs and downstream data integration workflows for automation.
Enhanced compliance and operational reporting using SAP BO/Crystal Reports.
Developed REST APIs in Node.js integrated with React for enterprise apps.
Built Agile progress charts using JIRA REST APIs to improve reporting efficiency.
Applied Agile methodology and Swagger documentation for better delivery.

projects.title: AI Portfolio
projects.description: An interactive conversational interface for my portfolio that leverages Azure OpenAI to provide natural language responses about my background and experience. Features include a secure proxy architecture, intelligent context management, and graceful fallback mechanisms. The chatbot represents me in first-person with sophisticated prompt engineering to ensure professional interactions.

projects.title: Progress AI
projects.description: An AI-powered goal achiever and progress tracking application that leverages Java Spring Boot with OpenAI function calling. It delivers structured AI-driven responses to monitor goals automatically, enabling smarter insights and reducing manual tracking effort. The frontend is built with React for an intuitive user experience.

projects.title: TO-DO and Video Call App
projects.description: A collaborative full-stack application that puts real-time video calling at its core, enabling seamless face-to-face communication alongside task management. Teams can connect instantly over video while organizing and tracking their TO-DOs in one integrated platform.

projects.title: AI-Powered Password Detection
projects.description: Replaced traditional regex-based detection with an AI/LLM-powered model that accurately distinguishes between usernames and passwords — reducing false positives/negatives by 10x and boosting developer confidence.

projects.title: On-Call AI
projects.description: An AI-powered incident analysis tool designed to assist on-call developers by automatically parsing logs, detecting anomalies, and correlating with past incidents. This accelerates root cause identification and resolution, reducing downtime and improving reliability of critical systems.

achievements: Microsoft Hackathon Winner — AI Developer Tools Category
Recognition for introducing AI/LLM-based solutions in enterprise developer workflows
Certified in Neural Networks and Deep Learning
